place.name: UZMASTON
place.gazetteerText: UZMASTON, or Ismiston, a parish in Haverfordwest district, Pembroke; 1½ mile SE of Haverfordwest r. station. Post town, Haverfordwest. Acres, 2,070. Real property, £2,576. Pop., 610. Houses, 130. The property is divided among a few. The living is a p. curacy in the diocese of St. Davids. Value, £100. Patrons, the Dean and Chapter of St. D. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
